description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Scare your friends (and enemies!) with what looks like a normal game.  Navigate the fly through a maze of webs, with a shocking surprise in the third level.
description.short: Scare your friends (and enemies!) with what looks like a normal game.  Navigate the fly through a maze of webs, with a shocking surprise in the third level.
